glsa.title: libksba: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libksba, allowing a possible Denial of Service and unspecified other vectors through integer overflows.

background.p: Libksba is a X.509 and CMS (PKCS#7) library.

description.p: libksba is vulnerable to two integer overflows and a Denial of Service vulnerability. Please read the references for additional details.

impact.p: Remote attackers could cause Denial of Service or unspecified other vectors through various integer overflows.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libksba users should upgrade to the latest version:

references.uri: Denial of Service due to stack overflow in src/ber-decoder.c
Integer overflow in the BER decoder src/ber-decoder.c
Integer overflow in the DN decoder src/dn.c
